questions.question: What is the root of a tree?
answers: The node with no parent
The node with no children
A node with two children
A node with only one child

questions.question: What is an AVL tree?
answers: A tree with all leaf nodes at the same level
A binary tree with a balance factor of -1, 0, or 1 for every node
A tree with nodes having at most two children
A tree with a single root
questions.correctAnswer: A binary tree with a balance factor of -1, 0, or 1 for every node

questions.question: Which traversal method visits the left subtree, the root, and then the right subtree?
answers: Preorder
Inorder
Postorder
Level Order

questions.question: What is the height of a tree?
answers: The number of nodes in the longest path from the root to a leaf
The number of edges in the longest path from the root to a leaf
The number of nodes in the tree
The number of leaves in the tree
questions.correctAnswer: The number of edges in the longest path from the root to a leaf

questions.question: In a binary search tree, where is the right child of a node located?
answers: To the right and has a smaller value
To the right and has a greater value
To the left and has a smaller value
To the left and has a greater value
questions.correctAnswer: To the right and has a greater value
